title: 05/07/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 05/07/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin reacts to Anthony Davis suffering another injury and what this means for the Lakers championship hopes with LeBron James still on the sidelines as well. He lays out a solution for the Packers to fix their relationship with disgruntled QB Aaron Rodgers. Plus, one of Rodgers’ former teammates AJ Hawk joins the show to separate fact from fiction regarding the reported disconnect between the reigning MVP and the Green Bay front office.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
